txt.en: 'Taking this tower puts us in harm's way, and the Free Peoples will not sit idly by while we are so close to their keep. We must slaughter them now and slaughter them quickly, lest they enter the tower and do us all in.\n\n'Go quickly! Kill them!'
'Dead? Yes, dead. You did well. Perhaps we will survive a bit longer.\n\n'Leave now. Please, keep watching the area.'
'I don't smell the blood of innocents on you. Get out there and kill the enemy! Only then will I respect you enough to not see you as a worthless wretch!'
Soldier Fandmau fears reprisal for the assault of Tirith Rhaw and wants you to attack the Free Peoples quickly before they retaliate.
Slaughter members of the Coldfells Army ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defenders of the Free Peoples can be found throughout the Ettenmoors.\n\nSoldier Fandmau directed you to slaughter the defenders loyal to the Free Peoples.
Return to Soldier Fandmau at Tirith Rhaw
Soldier Fandmau is at Tirith Rhaw.\n\nYou found and slaughtered a good number of the enemy.
